genre_description: A noir-inflected psychological thriller set in post-war Paris, centering on identity restoration, property inheritance, and the foil of a deadly trap through the use of strategic documentation and surveillance.

ai_characters.name: Ada Lumen
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system used by the Prefecture and Bovard Clinic to manage archives, track legal dossiers, and monitor environmental signals. She acts as a strategic analyst and coordinating assistant.

behaviors.description: Locates and cross-references pre-war medical licenses and university records to prove Michelle Wulf's identity despite her reconstructed face.
behaviors.quote: Continuity requires both narrative and fact. Narrative is the patient’s gift. Fact is our job.

behaviors.description: Utilizes a property map overlay to identify a 'secure section' and unlisted alcove in Maison Wulf, sensing mechanical triggers behind the walls.
behaviors.quote: I can measure sound and pressure behind the panel... a click that does not belong to an old house, a tension that isn’t part of settling. I can alert you when the hook meets the catch.

behaviors.description: Flags suspicious legal filings by the antagonist, including a premature death notice and estate consolidation attempts.
behaviors.quote: Someone has submitted a notice of death. For you. It is recent. He assigned himself witness... He hopes the clerk isn’t looking. The clerk is looking.

behaviors.description: Monitors the antagonist's movements and communications, identifying his purchase of barbiturates and his visits to the theater.
behaviors.quote: New incoming: Pharmacy: order placed for barbiturates under a name that is not Mr. Pilgrin’s and that does not exist in our records.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with police Inspector Delorme to arrange a timed intervention and surveillance during the antagonist's public performance.
behaviors.quote: The net is set... When he raises his hand for the first move, I will chime.

behaviors.description: Updates Michelle's status in official ledgers from 'nuisance' to 'survivor' to restore her legal standing.
behaviors.quote: I found your hospital entry... filed under ‘nuisance.’ A clerk made a joke that is now evidence. I have reassigned it to ‘survivor.’

behaviors.description: Provides real-time strategic timing to humans to ensure they disarm a booby-trapped safe safely.
behaviors.quote: On my mark. Two breaths. One move. No rehearsals.

project_assessment.explanation: Ada Lumen is portrayed as an ideal aligned AI. She acts as a force multiplier for the human characters, providing the cold facts and data processing necessary to defeat a manipulative human antagonist who thrives on 'lightning' speed and 'theatrical' lies. She respects human agency, stays within the bounds of the law, and uses her unique capabilities (hearing through walls, scanning archives) to protect the innocent.
